mapper.select: select user.id, user.email, user.name, user.tel_no, user.in_date, bname.code_name as bankName, bank_account.acc as bankAccount, phist.balance, detail.deal_count, detail.paysum, pqust.pqust_count, user.enabled, user.memo from user, bank_account, (select user_id, count(*) as deal_count, sum(pymt_prc) as paysum from deal_detail group by user_id ) AS detail, (select code, code_name from cmmn_code where code_type='BANK_NAME' ) AS bname, (select * from pnt_hist where id IN (select max(id) from pnt_hist group by user_id ) ) AS phist, (select user_id, count(*) as pqust_count from cs_psnl_qust group by user_id ) AS pqust where user.id = detail.user_id AND bank_account.bnk_code = bname.code AND user.id = phist.user_id AND user.id = pqust.user_id AND user.id=#{userId} ;
mapper.update: update user set memo=#{memo} where id=#{id}
